name: Rope (TL 3)
description: 50 meter length of fine flexible plasteel cable, capable of supporting kup to 250 kilograms. Rope is a versatile tool that has no real replacement even at higher tech levels. It is the single most important element of a climber's equipment; it can be used to bind prisoners; it can add safety to water or ravine crossings. A variety of types and sizes are available; in general, however, they are all similar in reliability and price within any given tech level.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
